author: .paulharris
content: consensus-specs #3769 appears to change proposer at electra fork, which admittedly does make sense given max balance changed... wondering when we're likely to do another release of reftests? I'm assuming this change will go in for devnet1...

author: hsiaowei
content:
I'm thinking about including more Electra open PRs to the next release together:

author: barnabasbusa
content: Is anyone opposed to me killing peerdas-devnet-0 please let me know in the next 24h. Otherwise it will be deleted.
